channel.title: CVE Feed for ethereum -- go-ethereum
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ethereum -- go-ethereum

item.title: CVE-2022-29177|2024-08-03T06:17:54.050Z -- ethereum -- go-ethereum
item.description: Go Ethereum is the official Golang implementation of the Ethereum protocol. Prior to version 1.10.17, a vulnerable node, if configured to use high verbosity logging, can be made to crash when handling specially crafted p2p messages sent from an attacker node. Version 1.10.17 contains a patch that addresses the problem. As a workaround, setting loglevel to default level (`INFO`) makes the node not vulnerable to this attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-32972|2024-06-04T17:50:49.796Z -- ethereum -- go-ethereum
item.description: go-ethereum (geth) is a golang execution layer implementation of the Ethereum protocol. Prior to 1.13.15, a vulnerable node can be made to consume very large amounts of memory when handling specially crafted p2p messages sent from an attacker node. The fix has been included in geth version `1.13.15` and onwards.

item.title: CVE-2024-32972|2024-08-02T02:27:53.323Z -- ethereum -- go-ethereum
item.description: go-ethereum (geth) is a golang execution layer implementation of the Ethereum protocol. Prior to 1.13.15, a vulnerable node can be made to consume very large amounts of memory when handling specially crafted p2p messages sent from an attacker node. The fix has been included in geth version `1.13.15` and onwards.
